files.patch:
@@ -74,1 +74,0 @@
-  # Setup username (for use in adhoc version strings etc)
@@ -76,0 +75,3 @@
+  [ USERNAME=`$ECHO "$USER" | $TR -d -c '[a-z][A-Z][0-9]'` ]
+
+  # Setup username (for use in adhoc version strings etc)
@@ -78,1 +80,1 @@
-    DEFAULT: [ `$ECHO "$USER" | $TR -d -c '[a-z][A-Z][0-9]'` ],
+    DEFAULT: $USERNAME,
@@ -80,0 +82,1 @@
+    DEFAULT_DESC: [current username, sanitized],
